casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tosha McDOUGAL. No. 581P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of December 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Writ of Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2007."
